span.strong: Social Emotional Resources during the time of Coronavirus

p.strong: Ending the Silence for Families (90 minutes)
p.br:
This is a Free 90 minute virtual presentation for families that teaches parents to recognize the warning signs in their teens and how to talk to them about their concerns.Â Â
Date: April 28, 2020Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Time: 10-11:30amÂ Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Link to join:Â https://zoom.us/j/98143500277

p.strong: Ending the Silence for Students (90 minutes)
p.br:
This is a Free 90 minute virtual presentation that teaches students what to watch for in their friends and themselves.Â It also teaches students how to speak with a trusted adult.Â Â
Date: April 21, 2020Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Time: 10-11:30amÂ Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Link to join:Â Â https://zoom.us/j/97130341583

p.span: Dr. David Schonfeld - Talking to and Supporting our Children During the Pandemic
âDr. David Schonfeld - Supporting Students and Ourselves During a Pandemic

p.strong: NAMI Weekly Virtual Recovery and Family Support Groups
p.br: These support groups are open to participants across the state of Georgia. For now, NAMI has secured Thursdays at 7pm. NAMI hopes to secure and share more dates and times in the near future.

div.a: Cook High School Named AP Challenge School

br.p: Students at CMS explore all of their career options.

p.span: To empower and inspire all learners

span.span: All students will succeed through enrollment in higher education, enlistment in the military, or employment in the workforce.
